attributes.action: Prevent the government implementing no driving days for any reason
attributes.additional_details: Stop implementing no driving days at any time . Allow people to travel in private vehicles at all times .
attributes.background: The government should not be allowed to implement no driving days on Sundays or any day of week. It will prevent families meeting , parents saying children , families seeing grandparents, those who work six days buying food in person. It will increase mental health issues . Prevent human contact

rejection.details:
We understand you're concerned about people being prohibited from driving on certain days, however there is no indication the Government is planning on introducing any such prohibition. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
